hl.seg: US Vice President Joseph بائیڈن elected arrive in Pakistan

doc.seg: External Affairs Minister has welcomed the US Vice President Elected
The United States elected Vice President Joseph بائیڈن along with his delegation on a tour of Pakistan have arrived in Islamabad on Friday .
External Affairs Minister , chief of Shah Mahmood Qureshi and US embassy officials have received them .
US Senator lindsy Graham also in this tour with بائیڈن .

US embassy press officer of low فنٹرنے Voice of America said that the newly elected President during his visit different from the Pakistani leadership will hold talks on regional issues , however he declined to disclose more details .
According to the foreign office sources , Joseph بائیڈن high government officials of the army chief General Ashfaq Pervez Kiani also will meet .
Is expected that these meetings in addition to the important bilateral and international issues related to the war against terrorism will also exchange views on issues .
Joseph was the recipient بائیڈن Hilal of Pakistan
Islamabad , Joseph after reaching بائیڈن met with the president Asif Ali Zardari .
In the meeting , President has Close ties between Pakistan and the United States on his role in establishing Hilal recipient of honor of Pakistan .
